page.title: 04Rose Queen Festival,Mellor.
page.content: On Saturday it was the Rose Queen Festival in Mellor.First we had a service in church when the Rose Queen was crowned .I was in the choir then we walked round the village.The procession was called "The Procession of Witness".The Sunday school,Day school and a band followed us round the Village too.There was a big Church banner which followed us. We stopped outside the Spar shop to sing a hymn called "Jesus shall reign".Then we carried on with the Procession.We passed the Smith's fruit shop and walked up to Church and sang"The Church's One Foundation"and then we went back to Church and changed our choir robes.After that we went into School and had tea.Keith flicked a bit of jelly at Christopher and it landed in his drink.Then we went into the field and had sports.
